Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 1:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers except periods of snow over higher terrain early this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
